attributes.action: For cats to be placed under the traffic act 1988.
attributes.background: My precious boy was hit by a car due to speeding in a residential area his injurys were that bad that it was death on impact and he was left in the road.Cats are part of people's family's what makes them more less to not be protected under this act they breathe the same.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make it an offence to hit a cat and drive off
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591698

Require drivers to report hitting a cat, and scans for cats hit by a car
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592811
